Name: Fist Method: Inhaling Vortex
Desc:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon a powerful vortex that absorbs enemy's spirits. Using the skill again cancels the vortex, and the amount of spirits absorbed proportionally restores HP and MP for party members.
Fist Method: Sucking Vortex does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon a powerful vortex that absorbs enemy's spirits Using the skill again cancels the vortex, and the amount of spirits absorbed proportionally heals HP and MP for party members.

Fist Method: Inhaling Vortex is not affected by enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Desc.New:
[Scroll Magic] Opens a scroll to summon a powerful vortex that absorbs enemy's spirits. Using the skill again cancels the vortex, and the amount of spirits absorbed proportionally restores HP and MP for party members.
Fist Method: Sucking Vortex does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
Scroll Power Cost: 900. Summons a vortex that attacks the enemy at 256% damage 6 times over 40 sec.
Absorbs 1 spirit per 4 hits. Up to 9 spirits can be absorbed. Attacking a Boss Monster absorbs 3 times more spirits.
Reusing the skill cancels the vortex. 1 spirit absorbed recovers HP and MP for party members by up to 5%.
H.New:
Scroll Power Cost: 900. Summons a vortex that attacks at 256% Damage 6 times for 40 sec.
Absorbs 1 spirit per 4 hits. Up to 9 spirits can be absorbed. Attacking a Boss monster absorbs 3 times the spirits.
Reusing the skill cancels the vortex. 1 spirit absorbed restores HP and MP for party members by up to 5%.
